attributes.action: consider the need for more late night opening or 24 hour opening pharmacies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Would it be viable to have 24 hour opening pharmacies through the country, this would maybe relive some of the pressure placed up on accident and emergency departments by the locum Dr's service that prescribe medications but can not issue these therefore the person gets sent to A&E for medication. If there where more pharmacies open later or overnight then this would relive this pressure
